rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment describes testing plans factually without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment describes a future action/plan ('will test'), not realised impact with a moderate verb + scale.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports planned action without explicit calming language.
Segment does not contain a minimiser used with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes planned future action ('department will test other flocks') and collaboration without explicit reassurance.
